title: Senate chief expresses deep sorrow over death of Mamnoon Hussain
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 14 (APP): Chairman Senate Muhammad Sadiq Sanjrani has expressed deep sorrow over the demise of former President Mamnoon Hussain.
The Chairman Senate prayed to Allah Almighty for forgiveness of the deceased and elevation of ranks.
He paid homage to the political and social services of the late Former President Mamnoon Hussain
Deputy Chairman Senate Senator Mirza Muhammad Afridi, Leader of the House in the Senate, Senator Dr Shehzad Wasim, Leader of the Opposition in the Senate, Senator Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani also expressed deep sorrow over the demise of former President Mamnoon Hussain.
In their condolence messages, they conveyed their heartfelt condolence to the family of the deceased and prayed to Allah Almighty for his forgiveness and elevation of ranks and patience for the mourners.
